alert.note: Alert for Centennial Mountains, Island Park (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Avalanche Warning issued January 24 at 4:37AM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...The Gallatin National Forest Avalanche Center in Bozeman has CONTINUED a BACKCOUNTRY AVALANCHE WARNING which is in effect until 6 AM MST Thursday... * WHAT...The Gallatin National Forest Avalanche Center continues an avalanche warning. The avalanche danger is HIGH on all slopes. Natural and human-triggered slides are very likely. * WHERE...The Centennial Mountains in Island Park, Idaho. * WHEN...In effect through to 6 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...New snow and an exceptionally weak snowpack are creating unstable conditions over a wide area. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Very dangerous avalanche conditions. Backcountry travelers should stay off steep slopes and away from the bottom of steep slopes. Avalanches can be triggered from flat terrain. Steep slopes can avalanche far above and run into lower-angled terrain. Check https://www.mtavalanche.com/forecast/island-park for more detailed information. Consult www.mtavalanche.com or www.avalanche.org for more detailed information. Similar avalanche danger may exist at locations outside the coverage area of this or any avalanche center.
